languages.text: Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.
languages.original_text: Убив первого врага за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, персонаж немедленно совершает дополнительную атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, против ближайшего противника тем же оружием, если это возможно. Эта атака наносит 30% от базового {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с бонусом +10% за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} убитого перед этим врага. Например, устранив цель I ранга, дополнительной атакой персонаж нанесет 40% урона.

traits.locale_text: Every round, after the character kills first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against one closest enemy they can target with the same weapon, if possible. This attack deals 40% base damage with a +15% bonus for every difficulty tier of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 55% damage in total.

Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base damage with a +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 55% damage in total.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional single attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

languages.text: La primera vez que el personaje mata a un enemigo en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el personaje lanza inmediatamente un ataque individual extra contra el enemigo más cercano al que pueda atacar con la misma arma (si lo hay), usando el ataque que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste. Este ataque inflige un 30 % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} base con un +10 % de bonificación por cada {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del primer enemigo abatido. Por ejemplo, si el enemigo era de nivel de desafío I, el ataque inflige un total del 40 % de daño.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: La primera vez que el personaje mata a un enemigo en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el personaje lanza inmediatamente un ataque individual extra contra el enemigo más cercano al que pueda atacar con la misma arma (si lo hay), usando el ataque que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste. Este ataque inflige un 30 % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} base con un +10 % de bonificación por cada {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del primer enemigo abatido. Por ejemplo, si el enemigo era de nivel de desafío I, el ataque inflige un total del 40 % de daño.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中にキャラクターが最初の敵を倒すと、そのキャラクターは可能であれば同じ武器でターゲット最も近くの敵に対して、最も{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストの少ない攻撃で、追加攻撃を即座に行う。この攻撃は、基本{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の30%に加えて、最初に倒した敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度レベル{/g}1につき+10%のボーナスを得る（例：敵が脅威度Iであった場合、この攻撃は計40%のダメージを与える）
languages.original_text: Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中にキャラクターが最初の敵を倒すと、そのキャラクターは可能であれば同じ武器でターゲット最も近くの敵に対して、最も{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストの少ない攻撃で、追加攻撃を即座に行う。この攻撃は、基本{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の30%に加えて、最初に倒した敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度レベル{/g}1につき+10%のボーナスを得る（例：敵が脅威度Iであった場合、この攻撃は計40%のダメージを与える）

languages.text: 每当角色在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次杀死敌人时，该角色会立即使用同样的武器，使用耗费行动点数最低的攻击方式，对距离最近的敌人发动一次额外的单体攻击。此次攻击造成30%的基础{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}伤害{/g}，首次杀死的敌人每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}，此次攻击获得10%的伤害{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}加值{/g}。例如，如果首个杀死的敌人难度等级为I，则此次攻击一共会造成40%的基础伤害。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: 每当角色在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次杀死敌人时，该角色会立即使用同样的武器，使用耗费行动点数最低的攻击方式，对距离最近的敌人发动一次额外的单体攻击。此次攻击造成30%的基础{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}伤害{/g}，首次杀死的敌人每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}，此次攻击获得10%的伤害{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}加值{/g}。例如，如果首个杀死的敌人难度等级为I，则此次攻击一共会造成40%的基础伤害。

languages.text: Tötet der Charakter in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} den ersten Gegner, unternimmt er sofort einen weiteren Angriff auf das nächstgelegene Ziel, das er mit derselben Waffe anvisieren kann. Dabei verwendet er den Angriff, der am wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet. Dieser Angriff verursacht 30 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Grundschaden{/g} mit einem Bonus von +10 % für jede {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des ersten getöteten Gegners. Hatte der Gegner beispielsweise Schwierigkeitsstufe I, verursacht dieser Angriff insgesamt 40 % Schaden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: Tötet der Charakter in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} den ersten Gegner, unternimmt er sofort einen weiteren Angriff auf das nächstgelegene Ziel, das er mit derselben Waffe anvisieren kann. Dabei verwendet er den Angriff, der am wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet. Dieser Angriff verursacht 30 % Grund{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}schaden{/g} mit einem Bonus von +10 % für jede {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des ersten getöteten Gegners. Hatte der Gegner beispielsweise Schwierigkeitsstufe I, verursacht dieser Angriff insgesamt 40 % Schaden.

languages.text: Après avoir éliminé le premier ennemi d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le personnage lance immédiatement une attaque supplémentaire contre l'ennemi le plus proche qu'il peut cibler, si possible avec la même arme. Cette seconde attaque est celle dont il dispose qui coûte le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cette attaque inflige 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de base assortis d'un bonus de 10% par {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} du premier ennemi tué ; autrement dit, si l'ennemi était de niveau de difficulté I, cette attaque inflige 40 % de dégâts au total.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir éliminé le premier ennemi d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le personnage lance immédiatement une attaque supplémentaire contre l'ennemi le plus proche qu'il peut cibler, si possible avec la même arme. Cette seconde attaque est celle dont il dispose qui coûte le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cette attaque inflige 30 % des{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de base assortis d'un bonus de 10% par {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} du premier ennemi tué ; autrement dit, si l'ennemi était de niveau de difficulté I, cette attaque inflige 40 % de dégâts au total.

languages.text: Убив первого врага за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, персонаж немедленно совершает дополнительную атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, против ближайшего противника тем же оружием, если это возможно. Эта атака наносит 30% от базового {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с бонусом +10% за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} убитого перед этим врага. Например, устранив цель I ранга, дополнительной атакой персонаж нанесет 40% урона.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, убив первого врага, персонаж немедленно совершает дополнительную одиночную атаку против ближайшего противника тем же оружием, если это возможно. Эта атака наносит 40% от базового урона с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +15% за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}уровень сложности{/g} убитого перед этим врага. Например, устранив цель со сложностью I, дополнительной атакой персонаж нанесет 55% урона.

Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, убив первого врага, персонаж немедленно совершает дополнительную одиночную атаку против ближайшего противника тем же оружием, если это возможно. Эта атака наносит 40% от базового урона с {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусом{/g} +15% за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}уровень сложности{/g} убитого перед этим врага. Например, устранив цель со сложностью I, дополнительной атакой персонаж нанесет 55% урона.

languages.text: Karakter, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez düşman öldürdüğünde mümkünse hedefleyebildiği en yakın düşmana aynı silahla anında ilave bir saldırı gerçekleştirir. Hangi saldırı daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcıyorsa onu kullanır. Bu saldırı, %30 taban {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve ilk öldürülen düşmanın her {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g} için bu hasar +%10 artar. Örneğin düşman I. zorluk derecesindeyse bu saldırı da toplamda %40 hasar verir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character kills the first enemy in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that character immediately makes an additional attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

traits.locale_text: Karakter, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez düşman öldürdüğünde mümkünse hedefleyebildiği en yakın düşmana aynı silahla anında ilave bir saldırı gerçekleştirir. Hangi saldırı daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcıyorsa onu kullanır. Bu saldırı, %30 taban {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve ilk öldürülen düşmanın her {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g} için bu hasar +%10 artar. Örneğin düşman I. zorluk derecesindeyse bu saldırı da toplamda %40 hasar verir.

languages.text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, after the character kills the first enemy, the character immediately makes an additional cheapest attack against the closest enemy they can target with the same weapon if possible. This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.

This attack deals 30% base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a +10% bonus for every {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the first killed enemy, i.e. if the enemy was of difficulty tier I, this attack deals 40% damage in total.
